1#include "ConnectionGraphicsObject.hpp"
2
3#include "Connection.hpp"
4#include "ConnectionBlurEffect.hpp"
5#include "ConnectionGeometry.hpp"
6#include "ConnectionPainter.hpp"
7#include "ConnectionState.hpp"
8#include "FlowScene.hpp"
9#include "Node.hpp"
10#include "NodeConnectionInteraction.hpp"
11#include "NodeGraphicsObject.hpp"
12
13#include <QtWidgets/QGraphicsBlurEffect>
14#include <QtWidgets/QGraphicsDropShadowEffect>
15#include <QtWidgets/QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent>
16#include <QtWidgets/QGraphicsView>
17#include <QtWidgets/QStyleOptionGraphicsItem>
18using QtNodes::Connection;
19using QtNodes::ConnectionGraphicsObject;
20using QtNodes::FlowScene;
21ConnectionGraphicsObject::ConnectionGraphicsObject(FlowScene &scene, Connection &connection) : _scene(scene), _connection(connection)
22{
23 _scene.addItem(this);
24 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsMovable, true);
25 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsFocusable, true);
26 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsSelectable, true);
27 setAcceptHoverEvents(true);
28 // addGraphicsEffect();
29 setZValue(-1.0);
30}
31ConnectionGraphicsObject::~ConnectionGraphicsObject()
32{
33 _scene.removeItem(this);
34}
35QtNodes::Connection &ConnectionGraphicsObject::connection()
36{
37 return _connection;
38}
39QRectF ConnectionGraphicsObject::boundingRect() const
40{
41 return _connection.connectionGeometry().boundingRect();
42}
43QPainterPath ConnectionGraphicsObject::shape() const
44{
45#ifdef DEBUG_DRAWING
46 // QPainterPath path;
47 // path.addRect(boundingRect());
48 // return path;
49#else
50 auto const &geom = _connection.connectionGeometry();
51 return ConnectionPainter::getPainterStroke(geom);
52#endif
53}
54void ConnectionGraphicsObject::setGeometryChanged()
55{
56 prepareGeometryChange();
57}
58void ConnectionGraphicsObject::move()
59{
60 for (PortType portType : { PortType::In, PortType::Out })
61 {
62 if (auto node = _connection.getNode(portType))
63 {
64 auto const &nodeGraphics = node->nodeGraphicsObject();
65 auto const &nodeGeom = node->nodeGeometry();
66 QPointF scenePos = nodeGeom.portScenePosition(_connection.getPortIndex(portType), portType, nodeGraphics.sceneTransform());
67 QTransform sceneTransform = this->sceneTransform();
68 QPointF connectionPos = sceneTransform.inverted().map(scenePos);
69 _connection.connectionGeometry().setEndPoint(portType, connectionPos);
70 _connection.getConnectionGraphicsObject().setGeometryChanged();
71 _connection.getConnectionGraphicsObject().update();
72 }
73 }
74}
75void ConnectionGraphicsObject::lock(bool locked)
76{
77 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsMovable, !locked);
78 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsFocusable, !locked);
79 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsSelectable, !locked);
80}
81void ConnectionGraphicsObject::paint(QPainter *painter, QStyleOptionGraphicsItem const *option, QWidget *)
82{
83 painter->setClipRect(option->exposedRect);
84 ConnectionPainter::paint(painter, _connection);
85}
86void ConnectionGraphicsObject::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
87{
88 QGraphicsItem::mousePressEvent(event);
89}
90void ConnectionGraphicsObject::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
91{
92 prepareGeometryChange();
93 auto view = static_cast<QGraphicsView *>(event->widget());
94 auto node = locateNodeAt(event->scenePos(), _scene, view->transform());
95 auto &connectionState = _connection.connectionState();
96 connectionState.interactWithNode(node);
97 if (node)
98 {
99 auto oppPort = oppositePort(connectionState.requiredPort());
100 node->reactToPossibleConnection(connectionState.requiredPort(), _connection.dataType(oppPort), event->scenePos());
101 }
102 //-------------------
103 QPointF offset = event->pos() - event->lastPos();
104 auto requiredPort = _connection.requiredPort();
105 // This moves the loose end exactly to the mouse position
106 if (requiredPort != PortType::None)
107 {
108 _connection.connectionGeometry().moveEndPoint(requiredPort, offset);
109 }
110 //-------------------
111 update();
112 event->accept();
113}
114void ConnectionGraphicsObject::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
115{
116 ungrabMouse();
117 event->accept();
118 auto node = locateNodeAt(event->scenePos(), _scene, _scene.views()[0]->transform());
119 if (node)
120 {
121 NodeConnectionInteraction interaction(*node, _connection, _scene);
122 if (interaction.tryConnect())
123 {
124 node->resetReactionToConnection();
125 }
126 }
127 if (_connection.connectionState().requiresPort())
128 {
129 _scene.deleteConnection(_connection);
130 }
131}
132void ConnectionGraphicsObject::hoverEnterEvent(QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent *event)
133{
134 _connection.connectionGeometry().setHovered(true);
135 update();
136 _scene.connectionHovered(connection(), event->screenPos());
137 event->accept();
138}
139void ConnectionGraphicsObject::hoverLeaveEvent(QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent *event)
140{
141 _connection.connectionGeometry().setHovered(false);
142 update();
143 _scene.connectionHoverLeft(connection());
144 event->accept();
145}
146void ConnectionGraphicsObject::addGraphicsEffect()
147{
148 auto effect = new QGraphicsBlurEffect;
149 effect->setBlurRadius(5);
150 setGraphicsEffect(effect);
151 // auto effect = new QGraphicsDropShadowEffect;
152 // auto effect = new ConnectionBlurEffect(this);
153 // effect->setOffset(4, 4);
154 // effect->setColor(QColor(Qt::gray).darker(800));
155}
